original_text: So Hanun took hold of David's officers. He cut off their hair. He also cut off the lower half of their clothes up to their hips. Then he sent them away.
korean_text: 하눈이 이에 다윗의 신하들을 잡아 그들의 수염을 깎고 그 의복을 볼기 중간까지 자르고 돌려보내매

sentences.original_text: So Hanun took hold of David's officers.
He also cut off the lower half of their clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 그들의 옷 아래쪽 반을 잘라냈다.
